title: Great Arab Minds Committee | His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi | His Excellency Saeed Al Nazari

quotes: Over the past years, he has held prominent positions in various sectors, including Secretary General of the Executive Council of Dubai (TEC), Chairman of the Emirates Competitiveness Council (ECC), Vice Chairman of the Emirates Investment Authority (EIA), Founding Chairman of the Young Arab Leaders (YAL), Managing Director of Dubai Media Incorporated (DMI).
